鑑識: (かんしき) - judgement/judgment/discernment/discrimination/having eye for; forensics/crime lab
鑑賞眼: (かんしょうがん) - appreciation (e.g. of art)

長: (chou/naga) - long , head, chief, leader, elder; merit, strong point; superiority; major
長々: (ながなが) - long; drawn-out; very long
長々しい: (ながながしい) - long, drawn-out; tedious
長々編み: (ながながあみ) - triple crochet; treble crochet; TR
長いこと: (ながいこと) - for a long time
長いファイル名: (ながいファイルめい) - long file name
長い事: (ながいこと) - for a long time
長い目で見る: (ながいめでみる) - to look at the long term
長い間: (ながいあいだ) - long time; long interval; for quite some time
長きにわたる: (ながきにわたる) - long (used with period of time); longstanding; for a long time
長きに亘る: (ながきにわたる) - long (used with period of time); longstanding; for a long time
長きに渡る: (ながきにわたる) - long (used with period of time); longstanding; for a long time

長っ細い: (ながっぽそい) - long and thin

長め: (ながめ) - (ant: 短め) longish; moderately long
長めに: (ながめに) - at the long end (e.g. hold); on the long side (e.g. cut)

長らく: (ながらく) - long; (for a) long time
